snippet: “The Gun Epidemic,” The New York Times’s first front page editorial since 1920, says it is “a national disgrace that people can legally purchase weapons designed specifically to kill people with brutal speed and efficiency.”
abstract: New York Times runs editorial on its front page calling for increased regulation on guns in response to spate of mass shootings; is first time since 1920 that paper has run editorial on page one.
lead_paragraph: “The Gun Epidemic,” The New York Times’s first front page editorial since 1920, says it is “a national disgrace that people can legally purchase weapons designed specifically to kill people with brutal speed and efficiency.”

headline.main: Gun Debate Yields Page One Editorial
